scripts.build: echo '--- Starting build process for Resume Studio ---' && npm run clean && echo '--- Compiling TypeScript (tsc) ---' && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npm run compile && echo '--- Copying static assets (cpx) ---' && npm run copy-static && echo '--- Ensuring build/images directory exists ---' && mkdir -p build/images && echo '--- Copying image assets (cpx) ---' && npm run copy-images && echo '--- Build completed. Contents of build folder: ---' && ls -R build
